title: Ibanez Guitars logo
content:
Hey guys,

I'm trying to figure out what font is used for the Ibanez Guitars logo seen below:

[http://www.musicmaker.ie/images/Logos/ibanez-logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100924174814/http:/www.musicmaker.ie/images/Logos/ibanez-logo.jpg)

Thanks for any help you can provide.

Regards,  
Jeff
author: sliderjeff

comments.content: Now that is a custom designed logo if I ever saw one.

Crud. Ok, bearing that in mind, any chance you can point me in the right direction to something that looks at least "close" to this?

Thanks,  
Jeff
